content: inspire colorful dreams wrapped in the cozy warmth of this classic-look crochet blanket stitched in red heart all in one granny square granny squares have never been so simple to crochet focus on the stitchwork including chain double_crochet single_crochet and more as the yarn changes colors on its own to create perfect 6 squares the finished motifs are then seamed together and trimmed with a solid shade of red heart super saver to complete your kaleidoscope blanket red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m main color mc soft white 0316 1 ball or 340 yds/310 m
